title: Reaching Your Child's Heart
itunes:author: Guest: Ginger Hubbard
itunes:summary: Have you ever been shocked by your child's mean words? The most loving thing you can do is correct their behavior and guide them on a better path. John and Danny discuss traits of effective and loving discipline. Receive the book I Can't Believe You Just Said That with your gift of any amount!
